coreAttributes.name: key-chain necklace
coreAttributes.description: A necklace made out of the three keys you acquired from the imp fortresses in Submission.

replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] firmly [npc.verb(grab)] [npc2.name], before draping the key-chain around [npc2.her] neck.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(take)] hold of [npc.her] key-chain, before lifting it up and over [npc.her] head.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(take)] hold of the key-chain, before lifting it up and over [npc2.namePos] head.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(grab)] the key-chain, before yanking it up and over [npc2.namePos] head.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(take)] hold of [npc.her] key-chain, before wrapping it around [npc.her] wrist.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(take)] hold of the key-chain, before wrapping it around [npc2.namePos] wrist.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] firmly [npc.verb(grab)] [npc2.namePos] wrist, wrapping the key-chain tightly around it.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(take)] hold of [npc.her] key-chain, unwrapping it from around [npc.her] wrist.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(take)] hold of [npc2.namePos] key-chain, unwrapping it from around [npc2.her] wrist.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(grab)] [npc2.namePos] key-chain, ripping it from [npc2.her] wrist.
